photoAlbum.model

Class Photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • photoAlbum.model.Photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Photo object with information on the photo's date, caption, tags, and associated album. Also includes actual photo image.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Photo(javafx.scene.image.Image image, java.util.Calendar photoDate, java.lang.String photoDateString)
      Creates an instance of a photo and initializes it with the associated image and date of photo.
